actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agency Administration.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Mrs. Ascenion M. Lujan, Noe Lujan, Sevedeo Lujan, Junior, Cordelia Lujan Lons, Antonioa Lujan, Venceslao Lujan, Marta Lujan, Felix Lujan, and Tovia Lujan.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to nine named individuals in full satisfaction of a claim against the United States arising out of the death of the husband and father of such individuals while employed under contract with the Atomic Energy Commission.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Mrs. Ascenion M. Lujan, Noe Lujan, Sevedeo Lujan, Junior, Cordelia Lujan Lons, Antonioa Lujan, Venceslao Lujan, Marta Lujan, Felix Lujan, and Tovia Lujan.
